fields.summary: [Java] Implement converter between Arrow record batches and Avro records

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.
status.name: Reopened

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

worklogs.comment:
tianchen92 commented on pull request #5059: ARROW-6199: [Java] Avro adapter avoid potential resource leak.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5059
 
 
   Related to [ARROW-6199](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6199).
   
   Currently, avro consumer interface has no close API, which may cause resource leak like AvroBytesConsumer#cacheBuffer.
   To resolve this, make consumer extends AutoCloseable and create CompositeAvroConsumer to encompasses consume and close logic. 
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

 ##########
 File path: java/adapter/avro/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/consumers/AvroBytesConsumer.java
 ##########
 @@ -79,4 +79,11 @@ public void setPosition(int index) {
   public FieldVector getVector() {
     return vector;
   }
+
+  @Override
+  public void close() {
+    if (cacheBuffer != null) {
+      cacheBuffer.clear();
 
 Review comment:
   Thanks, you are right, unnecessary here.
   1. close should release vectors but only when exception occurs, otherwise vectors should release by users.
   2. the same for iterator API later.
   PR updated now.

fields.description:
Currently, avro consumer interface has no close API, which may cause resource leak like {{AvroBytesConsumer#cacheBuffer}}.

To resolve this, make consumer extends {{AutoCloseable}} and create {{CompositeAvroConsumer}} to encompasses consume and close logic.
fields.summary: [Java] Avro adapter avoid potential resource leak.
